#!/bin/bash -v 
apt-get update 
apt-get install default-jdk -y 
update-alternatives --config java 
echo 'JAVA_HOME="/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java"' >> /etc/environment 
source /etc/environment.txt 
apt-get install curl -y 
cd /tmp 
curl -O https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.5/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.5.tar.gz 
mkdir /opt/tomcat 
tar -xf apache-tomcat-8.5.5.tar.gz -C /opt/tomcat --strip-components=1 
cd /opt/tomcat 
chmod -R 777 * 
cd bin 
chmod -R 777 *
chmod +x startup.sh 
./startup.sh 
echo '#!/bin/sh' > /opt/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh 
echo 'JAVA_OPTS=$JAVA_OPTS -Dspring.datasource.url="jdbc:mysql://YOUR_RDS_ENDPOINT:3306/csye6225"' >> /opt/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh 
echo 'JAVA_OPTS="$JAVA_OPTS -Dspring.datasource.username="' >> /opt/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh 
echo 'JAVA_OPTS="$JAVA_OPTS -Dspring.datasource.password="' >> /opt/tomcat/bin/setenv.sh 
chmod -R 777 * 
cd .. 
cd logs 
chmod -R 777 *
apt-get install ruby -y
cd /home/ubuntu 
curl -O https://aws-codedeploy-us-east-1.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/install 
chmod +x ./install 
./install auto

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable HTTP access via port 80, SSH access via port 22, HTTPS access via port 443
